column4: hello - I have a long distance friend who I have convinced to switch from Windows to Ubuntu. There were some minor problems but he is happy with Ubuntu. He now wants to upgrade to Hoary. He has the Nvidia driver installed. I heard there was a problem with doing the upgrade with the Nvidia driver and XOrg, but can't find any resolving info on this. Does anyone know if the problem has been fixed? Can he get round th
e problem by uninstalling the Nvidia module before upgrading, then reinstalling it after?
there are so many problems with so much hardware it is very hard to say.....there is only a select group of hardware known to work
if you use Linux you have to be very careful on the hardware you buy
